title: Missing Hextech Key in Loot?
body: Hi, the other day I got key fragment and I forged them into a Hextech Key, and yesterday it just disappeared  from my loot, my loot still shows  a "1" next to the tiny key icon. I thought it was a bug but it still hasn't started returned. Any and every help is appreciated.

replies.body: Hey I double checked for you and I was able to verify that you crafted a key and it is chilling in your inventory.  Try relogging in case this might have been caused by a syncing issue.

Hi, I was able to unlock a Hextech Chest with the key despite it not showing in my loot, it's all good now. 
Thanks.
